Features

1. Apply Content for Lists

No longer wasting time selecting multiple list items individually. In Contento, you only need to select one parent layer, and choose the name of the sublayers you want to apply content for, and that's it!

No more error alerts teaching you how should you use the tool, the tool knows how you use it.


2. Unsplash Photos

When you create an image library, you can not only "Choose from Unsplash" but also provide any external image urls.


3. Content Types & Settings

Contento provides various types of content libraries and settings to generate content that matches your need:

  1. Images: You can choose pixel width for images. If you didn't specify any value, Contento will go in auto mode, and it will apply 2x pixel for each layer individually. Note: this feature is only for Unplash image urls.
  2. Number: you can specify min value, max value, prefix, suffix, decimal numbers and thousand separators.
  3. Date & Time: you can specify date format, time format, time range and order.
  4. Serial number: you can specify start value, interval value, places, prefix, suffix.
  5. And for text or image libraries, you can specify the order of applying content.


4. Custom Libraries

You can create custom contents with types like text, images, numbers, date & time and serial number.
